node.name: XMLEspresso XML Editor Eclipse Plugin
node.shortdescription:
XMLEspresso 8.0.0 is a full featured editor for creating and maintaining XML documents. Its important features include:

-- It supports Standalone, Document Type Definition (DTD) and W3C XML Schema

-- XML document is guided by the underlying grammar

-- When no XML Schema or DTD is specified, the editor dynamically generates a grammar based on the current content

-- XML document can be validated against its DTD or W3C XML Schema

-- Advaced XPath search is available

-- XML documents can be transformed using XSLT transformations

-- XML content assist makes it easy to edit in Source view

-- Deisgn view makes it easy to add new elements, attributes and edit content
node.body:
XMLEspresso 8.0.0 is a full featured editor for creating and maintaining XML documents. Its important features include:

-- It supports Standalone, Document Type Definition (DTD) and W3C XML Schema

-- XML document is guided by the underlying grammar

-- When no XML Schema or DTD is specified, the editor dynamically generates a grammar based on the current content

-- XML document can be validated against its DTD or W3C XML Schema

-- Advaced XPath search is available

-- XML documents can be transformed using XSLT transformations

-- XML content assist makes it easy to edit in Source view

-- Deisgn view makes it easy to add new elements, attributes and edit content
